Articles.Content:
I think I have a little bit OCD, I want my craft be symmetric.

The new MK3 Cockpit makes me mad because there are are two "camera" texture on one side.

I have open the Mk3CockpitShuttle.tga in paint.net to edit it.

If erase the camera will left blank(Left one),

if use nearby pixel's color to cover the camera, a little bit different in color make big different in color in game(Right one)

From my observation, the left/ right side of the cockpit seems share same texture piece, the camera texture only apply one one side.

Can I edit the .mu file to delete the definition of camera texture?

http://www./download/marg66kxn3ed3u0/Mk3CockpitShuttle.tga

tell me if it works or not i didnt really test it
